title: Bihar Election 2025 Live Updates: ‘Congress, RJD failed to uphold coalition dharma,’ JMM says won’t contest Bihar polls
description: Bihar Assembly Election 2025 Live Updates: Jharkhand’s ruling party blamed the RJD and Congress of not including it in seat-sharing talks., Bihar Assembly Election 2025 Live Updates: Last week, Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj Party announced its second list of candidates, for 65 constituencies, taking the total number of declared nominees to 116 out of the state’s 243 seats.
raw_content: [skip to content](https://indianexpress.com/article/india/bihar-assembly-election-2025-live-updates-prashant-kishor-alleges-3-candidates-of-his-jan-suraaj-party-withdrew-nomination-under-pressure-from-bjp-10318419/#main-heading-article) Advertisement ![Live now](https://images.indianexpress.com/2018/03/live-now.gif) # Bihar Assembly Election 2025 Live Updates: Prashant Kishor alleges 3 candidates of his Jan Suraaj Party withdrew nomination under ‘pressure’ from BJP ## Bihar Assembly Election 2025 Live Updates: Last week, Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj Party announced its second list of candidates, for 65 constituencies, taking the total number of declared nominees to 116 out of the state’s 243 seats. title: ‘Truth is not what they showed’: Akhilesh Yadav, AAP target BJP after Ayodhya Deepotsav record | India News - The Indian Express
description: Two new world records were set at this year's Deepotsav in Ayodhya: one, for the largest display of oil lamps, and second, for most number of people performing 'aarti' simultaneously, Two new world records were set at this year's Deepotsav in Ayodhya: one, for the largest display of oil lamps, and second, for most number of people performing 'aarti' simultaneously

(Photo: Screengrab from Video over X/@AamAadmiParty) Samajwadi Party (SP) leader Akhilesh Yadav, and the Aam Aadmi Party Tuesday came down heavily on the Bharatiya Janata Party-led government in Uttar Pradesh over the “reality of inflation and poverty” that has gripped the state.
